response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique features and quality. Given its worth to you, I propose a transaction price of $1,100,000. This offer not only allows you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate but also enables us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
